Reviews.Title: “Would go back - nothing bad to point out”
Reviews.Author: Kallaliina
Reviews.Content: stayed friends 4 days dont bad third trip rome hotel people reception friendly talking hotels rome odd reason pretty demanding call reception times provided time waiting clean sheets changed everyday plenty choices breakfast italian hotels theres metro station close hotel easy supermarket decent restaurant found near theres barrestaurant hotel ate packed people im food hotel winebar floor

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - a gem away from the crowd”
Reviews.Author: Welcomeaa
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel flight late 11pm convenient catch train ostiense train station minutes walk hotel nearby pyramide metro station directly colosseum bathroom spacious clean private balcony design hotel artistic stayed april 2012 traveled family

Reviews.Title: “Good choice when you are in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Seeyen_malaysia
Reviews.Content: bathroom spacious hotel serves breakfast lots variety 5mins walk train station coffee facility reception nice help provide hot water lounge ground floor travel mates stayed bit disappointing wall painted dark blue makes dark

Reviews.Title: “Good, but could be updated”
Reviews.Author: ItalianFan
Reviews.Content: stayed business trip am looking transport access wifi decent restaurant bar near hotel staff friendly helpful clean downside bed linen bath towels thin paper pillows positive breakfast fantastic rome standard provide continental buffet typical bar door ostiense train station handy average rome local restaurants streets backyes

Reviews.Title: “Great gem away from the crowds - art lovers take note!”
Reviews.Author: JSudano
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic change sometimes staff friendly language barrier near city center short walk piramide metro station neighborhood described coming whatever else call safe bit wary staying reading reviews descriptions coming renewed austin described unsafe nice pleasantly surprised graffiti buildings image dangerous gritty actually people unsafe cab ride trastevere restaurants maybe 7 10 euros staff nice answered questions sometimes bothering dont speak italian english customer service spectacular suite 504 private balcony huge bathroom comfortable artwork beautiful furniture lighting added ambiance idea booked superior double junior suite maybe upgraded amazing complaint dark night direct overhead lighting available bedroom pluses include digital disturb button door lock button bathroom beautiful blue tiles lcd flatscreen tv dark curtains sleep breakfast hotel free job mornings eggs tasty usually cold run stick mini pastries bread salami cheese juices cereals yogurt teacoffee pleasantly surprised hotel decor comfort return rome definitely staying excellent value money escape tourists quiet beautiful refuge ostiense

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it...Need some renovation”
Reviews.Author: SmartTravellerHK
Reviews.Content: hotel definitely hip renovation bed comfortable pillow thin poor designs including bathroom water bedroom flooded bathroom cause poor bath design getting hurt hitting sharp corners bed table hotel noisy sucks

Reviews.Title: “Modern hotel close to train and subway”
Reviews.Author: Heri_SE
Reviews.Content: hotel located outside rome close train station airport 10 min walk subway prefect stay don´t pay overprice stay city center waked day coloseum hotel 30 min hotel modern standard stayed tried restaurant highly recommend restaurants nearby streets breakfast ok special staff time friendly service minded hotel am rome

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lesley6CO
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights modern arty theme green floor clean painted green sky muriel painted ceiling breakfast plentiful choices fruits yoghurt pastries breads etc scrambled egg bacon start days nearest metro pyramide 510 min walk main road depending speed main train staion distance easy walk station arrive airport hotel definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant hotel- great service”
Reviews.Author: lea5834
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel weeks location convenient heart central rome close subway getting easy stay hospitality shown front desk workers workers friendly personable helpful pleasant vary greatly cozy gone business weeks beds ok comfortable twins pushed larger bed comfortable drawback lack fitness center accessible street recommend hotel stay
